meanings.definition: Extend a joint beyond its normal range of motion.
meanings.sent1: Be careful not to hyperextend your arm while reaching for the top shelf.
meanings.sent2: She accidentally hyperextended her knee while dancing.
meanings.sent3: Trying to hyperextend your elbow to scratch your back is quite a challenge!
meanings.sent4: His determination to win the race made him hyperextend his legs to the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The gymnast's ability to hyperextend her body amazed the audience.

meanings.definition: To stretch out or straighten to an excessive degree.
meanings.sent1: You can hyperextend the rubber band too much and it might snap.
meanings.sent2: He tends to hyperextend his fingers when playing the piano passionately.
meanings.sent3: She hyperextended the truth a bit when telling her story.
meanings.sent4: The tree branches seemed to hyperextend towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush seemed to hyperextend across the canvas with each stroke.
